str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From paraballo; a similitude, i.e. fictitious narrative, apothegm or adage.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To consider, understand, perceive. From sun and hiemi; to put together, i.e. to comprehend; by implication, to act piously.
